title: What's the best way to dedicate yourself to studying? - Quora

response.answer_text: What's the best way to dedicate yourself to studying? Finding motivation to studying an pursue a degree can be very difficult. What are some tips and tricks to help focus on studying? Here's my quick response to the thrust of your question. Drawing on my extensive professional coaching experience, I firmly believe that the best way to dedicate yourself to studying is to: set goals;acquire strategy;There are a few important things you can do immediately, and for the longer term to help you to become a focused master student. First things first. At least at the macro-cosmic level, establish compelling, inspiring and overarching long range goals and objectives, broken down into short-term, medium-term, and long-term perspectives, and covering all the major life dimensions, with academic pursuit as your top priority, followed by a systematic game plan, in your life to drive you. With a game plan in place, you can then factor in your learning agenda, or study plan, or even side-gig project plan, if any. But more importantly, with the end in mind, goals, priorities and a plan, set your direction and keep you focused on the things that matter to you the most. Using a military analogy, goals, priorities and a plan, are like precise commands preset into the flight plan of a Tomahawk cruise missile, homing on to a predefined, long-distance target. Secondly, at the micro-cosmic level, learn, acquire and practise proven efficient and effective study and productivity tools to help you navigate you academic journey with ease, expediency, and ace. I have already written extensively about these academic strategies, and the web-links are appended below: Say Keng Lee's answer to How can I get good studying habits? Say Keng Lee's answer to How do I study for school exams to get higher marks? Say Keng Lee's answer to We lose concentration or focus on studies after 2.5 hours. Why, and what can we do to keep concentration? Enjoy your reading, exploration and assimilation! Godspeed! [2016_Consolidated Study Smart Strategies]
